mapper.select:
select
,
from sys_customer_unit WHERE STATE = 1
and NAME like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and CREDIT_CODE LIKE concat('%',#{creditCode},'%')
and cus_replace LIKE concat('%',#{cusReplace},'%')
ORDER BY CREATE_TIME desc
